Unjail defines a method for unjailing a jailed validator, thus returning
them into the bonded validator set, so they can begin receiving provisions
and rewards again.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
